Lego Winnovation

For Winnovation summer 2023 I was tasked by teacher to design trophies for the event and upcomming ones. After some meetings I ended up creating a computer chip that was "broken" in half. With the theme of the price comming out of the top. these themes are in order from left to right (as seen in the picture): presentation, public, green, innovation, inclusion.

These prices where given away to the student whom won their respected categorie. While I was able to get either money or study points for the project. I ended up just doing it for fun.
Site by Jens Hobo 2023 V2.6
